channel.title: Week 9: Deepening Cloud Optimization Skills and Exploring Web Application Performance & Security :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: Objectives: Strengthen cloud optimization knowledge across performance, cost management, and scaling. Explore web application security fundamentals and threat mitigation patterns. Practice hands-on AWS labs to reinforce concepts learned in previous weeks. Improve understanding of CDN behavior, caching strategy, and edge security controls.
